overview: The Pack Attack gangbang series from Hot House Entertainment returns with another cast of horsehung hunks determined to bring one lucky man to his knees. Pack Attack 2 stars Marco Paris, one of the industry's most insatiable power-bottoms and king of the famous "reverse cowboy." Can this pack of big-dicked wranglers rope him and ride him? Grab Pack Attack 2 and find out!
title: Pack Attack 2: Marco Paris
